name: @jasonlwalker/jlwappbuilder
description: Utility library for building HTML5 web applications

scripts.msbuild: npm config set script-shell 'C:\Program Files\git\bin\bash.exe' && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm update && cp ./node_modules/@jasonlwalker/jlwutility/*.js ./ && npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f libJlwAppBuilder.min.js && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent
scripts.clean: rm -f libJlwAppBuilder.min.js && rm -f libJlwUtility.* && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.version:add:
echo "/* Jlw App Builder Library $(npm run version:extract --silent)
* Â© Jason L Walker 
* Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')
*/
$(cat libJlwAppBuilder.min.js)" > libJlwAppBuilder.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
